- Fatigue, which has been gradually worsening over the past two weeks

These symptoms came into fruition quite quickly, with the fever and bleeding starting suddenly and the fatigue building over time. I’ve been feeling unusually tired, and my gums have been bleeding more than usual, especially when brushing my teeth. I also noticed my skin looks paler than usual and that I’ve been more breathless than normal, even with mild activity.
